title: wd1

content: Hello,I am a web developer and designer with over 5 years of experience. I can create a modern and mobile-friendly WordPress website, e-commerce store or blog for you,  starting from just $95. Everything in the website from the color to the fonts will be tailored according to your requirements.Here are some wordpress sites I have made:https://hekrenovations.comhttps://www.weburnshop.com/https://geoperspective.orghttps://www.pinayschengenvisa.comI strive to make the website as fast as possible and don't use anything unnecessary. The delivery time will be pretty fast too and I will give you my opinion as well on different aspects of the site.I am proficient in React.js development too and can build most types of app. Here are some apps I have made (second is a dummy portfolio ecom store):http://farmbitcoin.xyz/https://cryptocal.netlify.apphttps://reactecomsite.netlify.app/https://imgssearch.netlify.app/I have also made web scrapers, small python scripts for different clients in the pasts. Feel free to send me a PM and we can talk further. Thanks for your time!!--------------------------------------You can either PM me or contact at the email below:email: webdev16@proton.me

comments.author: wd1
comments.body: P.S I am having trouble replying to private messages since I have a limit of 2 per day only since I am a newbie. Here's some other contact info:discord: wd#0647email: bakupixels@protonmail.com

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: You also need to understand how this forum work. You don’t need to create new topic every day with the same content, just bump it. repeating the same is considered spam.You can find my discord in profile page, so you answer me on there about things we start talking through PM.ps.
